meta.title: Milkcocoa.authWithMilkcocoa
meta.description: Authenticates a Milkcocoa client using a popup-based Milkcocoa authentication flow.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options to configure the app's services. Value must not be null.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: After authentication, you can use a `milkcocoa`, the initialized app.
